statement.p: Find the area of the quadrilateral shown. The lengths of the four sides (counterclockwise) are \displaystyle{a}={5.8} , \displaystyle{b}={7.4}, \displaystyle{c}={10.3}, and \displaystyle{d}={12.2}, with diagonal from first to third point \displaystyle{e}={11.2}. Measurements are in yards. What is the area of this figure?
